articles.author: TIMESOFINDIA.COM
articles.title: Coronavirus: What's the safest seat in a flight? - Times of India
articles.description: Air travel has picked up once again and with people starting to move around amidst the new normal, people still tend to wonder which will be the safest seat in a flight.
articles.content:
Even though travelling may not be the best measure, if you really cannot avoid taking a flight, here are some of the precautionary measures you should be taking:
-Pregnant women, young children and … [+662 chars]
